job.name: Timing
job.command: # source ~/.tcshrc echo $INPUTFILE0 set subdir = `basename ${INPUTFILE0} | sed -e 's/.sl73_//'` if (! -d ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}/${subdir}) mkdir ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}/${subdir} cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}/${subdir} switch (${subdir}) case "*gcc631*": setup gcc631 breaksw case "*gcc12*": setup gcc/12 breaksw case "*gcc13*": setup gcc/13 breaksw default: setup gcc endsw switch (${subdir}) case "*opt*": setup opt breaksw default: setup debug endsw switch (${subdir}) case "*R6": setup spackTFG spack env activate x86_64_gcc12 spack env view enable setup root6 breaksw default: setup root5 endsw starver .DEV2 echo "STAR_LIB = ${STAR_LIB}" # set exec = "root4star" set exec = "root.exe" # echo ${BITS} | grep '64\.' # if (! $?) set exec = "root.exe" # ${exec} -q -b 'bfc.C('$f','$l',"'$chain',Sti")' >& ${logFile} # ${exec} -q -b 'bfc.C(100,"P2010a,btof,BEmcChkStat,Corr4,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull","/star/rcf/test/daq/2010/029/st_physics_11029020_raw_1030002.daq")' >& ${logFile} # ${exec} -q -b 'bfc.C(200,"P2018,McTpcAna,TpxRaw,TpxClu,-hitfilt,mtd,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrX,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,evout,NoHistos,noRunco,StiCA,CorrX","/hlt/cephfs/daq/2018/152/19152033/st_physics_adc_19152033_raw_5000002.daq")' >& ${logFile} # ${exec} -q -b 'bfc.C(200,"P2018,mtd,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrX,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,evout,NoHistos,noRunco,StiCA,CorrX","/hlt/cephfs/daq/2018/152/19152033/st_physics_adc_19152033_raw_5000002.daq")' >& ${logFile} # ${exec} -q -b 'bfc.C(200,"P2020a,StiCA,evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,PicoVtxVpdOrDefault","/hlt/cephfs/daq/2019/355/20355004/hlt_20355004_10_01_000.daq")' >& ${logFile} ${exec} -q -b -x 'bfc.C(2000,"P2019a,mtd,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrY,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,picoWrite,PicoVtxVpdOrDefault","/hlt/cephfs/daq/2019/192/20192001/hlt_20192001_11_01_000.daq")' >>& hlt_20192001_11_01_000.log
